data.title: S&P Capital IQ Pro
data.meta_description: S&P Capital IQ Pro is a single platform for essential market intelligence. Access deeper data on global financial markets and companies that impact your business.
data.text:
We pursue quality in everything we do. We strive to produce and deliver data that you can count on, and we've made a commitment to keep improving every day. That's why we created our Quality Program. True to our heritage, we continue to offer the industry's only $50 reward for a data error or omission.

Capital IQ Pro empowers informed decisions with access to 62,000+ public companies, including 47,000 active companies with current financials and a database of 52M+ Private Companies, including 1.04M+ early-stage companies.

Gain insights to drive your assessments of market winners with 140+ Estimates metrics for over 18,300 active companies from 110+ countries. S&P Global’s acquisition of Visible Alpha compliments our broad estimates solution with deep, granular, and transparent consensus and broker estimates data that reveals the assumptions and logic extracted directly from raw sell-side analyst models. This detail is from 200+ of the world’s leading brokers covering 1M+ total consensus line items.

Uncover Fixed Income data with access to 115,000+ loan facilities, including over 3,700 with current-day live prices, spread-to-maturity, yield, and more. Discover Ownership details on 45,000+ public companies, 35,000+ institutions, 47,000+ funds, and 328,000+ insiders.

Stay ahead with Transactions data on over 980,000 M&As, 646,000 public offerings, and 550,000 rounds of funding, including 100,000+ Crunchbase offerings. Get comprehensive Macroeconomic data on major indicators like inflation, employment, GDP, and more. Access a full spectrum of strategic risks for 200+ countries and territories from our Economics & Country Risk research and analysis.

Navigate the markets with rich visualization tools that help you spot what others can't. Use your customizable Dashboard for company analysis and market performance over time with widgets including Charts and our classic Chart Builder app, now integrated with ChartIQ and its addition of 125 unique technical indicators to address industry-specific needs. Maps helps you visualize geographic and asset-level data to gain new perspectives, and many others.

Seamlessly power your proprietary models and streamline presentations with our easy-to-use suite of Capital IQ Pro Office Tools. Access a library of hundreds of ready-to-use models and templates, or partner with our support analysts to build your own. Integrate data from Excel to PowerPoint or Word with fewer errors and refresh formulas in Excel with just one click.

Leverage the Screener in Excel or on the platform to build efficient reports based on the data you seek. Utilize a variety of filters and Screener types to compile Company, Transactions, Assets, Geographic or Industry Data.

Get 5 minutes smart before a meeting by receiving important push alerts, reading top industry news, and monitoring intraday market movements for your portfolio with the S&P Capital IQ Pro mobile app.

Keep up with market developments, identify risks, and surface opportunities with real-time news & insights on S&P Capital IQ Pro. Your subscription includes access to exclusive insights on global financial markets and industries and real-time news and analysis from The Wall Street Journal, Barron’s, MarketWatch, Dow Jones Newswires, The Nikkei, Nikkei Asia, and other leading news outlets.

Go beyond the typical news story with articles enhanced with related content and data. Browse insights that are most relevant to you with a personalized homepage. Monitor real-time headlines on topics you care about with a customizable Dashboard. Conduct company and market research with a vast archive or historical news coverage. Stay informed on the latest developments with focused news alerts, and read articles on the go with the S&P Capital IQ Pro mobile app.

Raise your next fund, identify investment opportunities, deploy capital, drive value-creation strategies, and deliver returns with our continually expanding coverage of Private Companies. Unlock core data and differentiated analytics on S&P Capital IQ Pro, including 9.6M+ companies with recent fundamentals, 52M+ private company profiles, and 69k+ PE/VC funds supplemented with Preqin data.

Utilize Topic Tags and Market Maps to assess the landscape of niche or emerging spaces, often dominated by early-stage, privately held companies.

By partnering with Preqin, the leader in data on alternative assets, we deliver robust private market coverage. Access fund profiles, fundraising performance, deals, and exits associated with 50k+ firms and 146k+ funds across multiple asset classes.

Access financial and operational metrics at the asset level across our key covered industries for Banking,Insurance, Real Estate, Energy, Metals and Mining, Media and Telecom, andTechnology.

Our business sector intelligence sets us apart from the competition, providing comprehensive and standardized sector-specific financial data, source tagging, ratio analysis, Excel® templates, asset-level information, mapping, and regulatory data. Our suite of business sector services offers a holistic view of both individual companies and entire industries.

Access our latest industry news and proprietary sector research to stay ahead of market volatility and regulatory changes. Effectively track company analysis and market performance using our customizable Dashboard. Visualize geographic and asset-level data with our mapping tool to highlight industry trends paramount to your strategy.

S&P Capital IQ Pro Labs serves as the innovation hub for S&P Capital IQ Pro, fostering collaborative and innovative product development. It allows you to test beta applications and solutions and provide us with feedback to shape future developments.

Analyze deep data with Topical Key Phrases and Trending Topics to discover trending topics and identify the most significant key phrases within earnings call transcripts. Explore news articles that drive market sentiment and visualize net positivity across time on a company level with News Sentiment.

In addition, there are in-production solutions ready to transform your unstructured data into meaningful and actionable business insights. Kensho NERD identifies the key companies, people, and events in textual data and links them to the Capital IQ and Wikimedia knowledge bases. Kensho Classify is a fully-scalable AI natural language processing (NLP) tool that identifies and tags text documents with concepts and topics. Kensho Scribe takes financial audio and transforms it into text, with unparalleled accuracy and speed. Explore these today in S&P Capital IQ Pro Labs.

The M&A team at this U.K.-based, standalone investment bank works with a wide range of public and private firms that are looking to monetize their business through a sale. The team was relatively pleased with their existing information provider but felt additional data and analytical insights could give them a competitive edge.

With the S&P Capital IQ Pro platform, the team gained access to an unrivaled combination of data, tech-forward productivity tools, news, and research - all in a single solution. They now could perform comparative analysis for both public and private companies, analyze a deep pool of datasets with the screener tool, and visualize data with advanced mapping and charting.

With access to greater data accuracy and more comprehensive financial information, the team was able to quickly identify “Peer Comps” (i.e. companies that share various traits with the target company), better understand private markets with Preqin data, and sharpen their analysis with pre-built model templates and reports.

Throughout the sales and onboarding process, the U.K.-based investment bank was delighted with the level of service they received from their Market Intelligence partners. The team took the time to understand their business and ongoing workflows, and delivered extensive live and on-demand training to quickly build platform proficiency.

With S&P Capital IQ Pro, the investment bank team found a one-stop, world-class solution for everything from quantitative analysis to deal structuring across public and private markets.
